name: Healthy Curry Chicken Salad
description: This Trader Joe's-inspired curry chicken salad recipe is full of protein and perfectly balanced with sweet and savory flavors.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cooked and cubed
1 batch Greek Yogurt Curry Sauce (see below)
pinch each of salt and pepper
instructions: Toss all ingredients together in a large bowl until combined. Serve immediately, or store in a sealed container for up to 4 days. Whisk all ingredients together in a medium bowl until combined.  Taste, and season with extra salt, pepper, and/or lemon juice if needed.
